Key Match Events: Santi Aldama had team highs with 27 points and five 3-pointers.
Ja Morant tallied 22 points, 10 assists and five rebounds.
Lauri Markkanen netted a game-high 35 points and added nine rebounds.
Walker Kessler had 16 points, 14 rebounds and five blocked shots.
Jordan Clarkson added 17 points and Collin Sexton 16 for Utah.
Bane hit a key 3-pointer with about six minutes left in the fourth quarter.
Morant and Marcus Smart made key layups in the waning moments to secure the win.
Utah tied it again at 116-116 on Walker Kessler’s tip-in with under three minutes remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies turned 17 turnovers by the Jazz into 24 points and hit seven more 3-pointers (17 vs. 10).
